There was a point when she realized,
the real adventure was not outside but within.
There came a time after countless trips and travels that the movement became enough.
So she slowed down.
And she let the softness inside of her guide her instead.
She stayed and she listened.
What she heard surprised her,
for it was not a song of peace.
It was a song of warrior-ship,
instead.
It was the tune of one who had been fighting for so long.
So she forgave herself,
and she cried a small river of tears.
And she whispered,
'it's okay. You have done enough.'
For the woman now knew value was not built around what she had achieved.
She understood the mystery of her was worth so much more.
And so she waited.
Paused and patient she discovered,
what came to her was meant to arrive.
She opened up each window and door of her soul and she shouted, 'take me. I've only ever wanted to be all yours.'
That is when she crumbled. 
That is also the point where she rose up again, ever strong.
Warrior-ship is also surrender.
A true fighter recognizes she must frequently yield to the unknown.

#letitunravel #surrender #peacefulwarrior #softheart #yeildtolove #themystery #unfolds #noforcing #recieving #beauty #guidance #pause #thejourney #thenwetransform #sarahnorrad #buddhistyogini #writetolive #thewayoutisin #rise #theunknown

So it's almost 2 weeks since I competed at Arnold Classic Africa. So honoured to have placed 2nd in my lineup, against some of the Worlds Best💚💚💚.. and since then I have been over indulging in carbs and sugar and some fatty foods I've refrained from eating while I've been on prep... Now doing a quick prep for a photoshoot scheduled for this saturday and needing to tighten up just a little bit to get my abs to show up for the shoot this saturday🙈🙈🙈Luckily it's a Lifestyle shoot and not a stage/comp shoot so the abs don't need to be rock hard...but still.....I  hope they're not too shy!!! 🙄😊😁 #usn #usnsa #bwapparel #bwathleticwear #kspa #gobrownspraytan #fitglam_bikinis #mim_meinmotion #RISE #prep #fitness #fit #fitspo #fitspiration #rip #ripped #lifestyle #live #love #laugh #happy #smile #pic #selfie #workout #work #workhard #workhardhustleharderstayhumble

NEW BLOG POST all about why we should be grateful for most hardships! After what I've been through, this blog is very near to my heart! .
🔥
Every human I know responds negatively to stress. In fact, most of us will do just about anything to avoid trials, tribulations, stress, roadblocks & any sort of stimulus that pulls us out of our comfort zones. I can’t tell you how many times I’ve heard the words, “why do bad things happen to good people?” I used to be one of those who echoed that same sentiment when I was going through rough patches, but then I started to notice something about myself. When I was in my comfort zone, I usually became complacent. For me, this equalled stagnation. Why would I change? Everything FELT good, comfortable, easy. Only when I fell on my face & had to re-evaluate my values, was I willing to change. You see pain serves a very noble purpose. It pushes us beyond what we think we can handle; it cracks us open; it brings us to our knees & molds us into someone stronger. The key is how much stress, to what extent, & how we perceive it. 🔥
.
What does science say about SHORT lived stress? New research coming out on what heat can do for healing shows that saunas can trigger the stress response in the body in a similar fashion as exercise. The concept is known as Hyperthermic Conditioning & now research has shown that it can affect everything from endurance to growth of new brain cells. In fact, studies are now showing increases in secretion of HGH, or human growth hormone, as well as activation of HSP, or heat shock proteins. HGH increases stamina, promotes longevity & is anti aging. Its levels drop off after age 30 & this is what leads to aging, so you can see how increasing this hormone naturally is very important to health. HSP, or heat shock proteins, are also activated during heat exposure & stress. High heat serves a purpose, you see as it can denature or destroy proteins. This is beneficial as it kills off protein capsids of viruses during a fever, but does not harm the body’s innate proteins due to none other than, HSP. This is HSP’s job-to prevent protein degradation in the body when it is exposed to high heat. CONT IN COMMENTS
